name: 2nd International Conference and Exhibition on Carbon Nanotubes & Graphene Technologies
content: To promote current research outcomes within the research communities to enhance their current knowledge in the field of Carbon Nanotubes and Graphene Technologies and to discover new trends for future applications which are safer, cheaper and easier, OLC International is organizing the 2nd International Conference and Exhibition Carbon Nanotubes and Graphene Technologies on will be held during September 13-15, 2021 in Naples, Italy. The theme of the conference is Atoms Integration- The Study on Upcoming Trends in Graphene Industry.
